The CampController class manages camps and provides functionality for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting camps.

The CampFilterController class manages filtering strategies for camps.

cams - package cams
The CAMs application.
cams.camp - package cams.camp
A group of classes making up the entity and controller for camp.
cams.domain - package cams.domain
A group consisting of staff and student-related classes, which represents the User domain of the application.
cams.filter - package cams.filter
A group of classes consisting of the filtering logic used by CampFilterController.
cams.repliable - package cams.repliable
A group of classes making up the entity and editor of repliables (suggestion and enquiry).
cams.serializer - package cams.serializer
A group of classes responsible for serializing and deserializing .xlsx files.
cams.user - package cams.user
A group of consisting of User and the control classes UserController, which stores all users, and AuthController which facilitates User login, logout and change password.
cams.view - package cams.view
A group of user interface elements.
cams.view.base - package cams.view.base
A group of base user interface elements which are extended to create more specific user interface components.
cams.view.components - package cams.view.components
A group of specific user interface components which extends from the cams.view.base package.
cams.view.components.auth - package cams.view.components.auth
A group of user interface used to get inputs for user authentication and changing user password.
cams.view.components.camp - package cams.view.components.camp
A group of user interface components specific to the camp functionality.
cams.view.components.repliable - package cams.view.components.repliable
A group of user interface menus Users can use to interact with Repliable objects.
cams.view.components.staff - package cams.view.components.staff
A group of user interface menus accessible by Staff.
cams.view.components.student - package cams.view.components.student
A group of user interface menus accessible by Students.
